name: The Holy Order of the Myxogastrian Knights
name_original: The Holy Order of the Myxogastrian Knights
description:
The Knights of the Myxogastrian Order are devoted to their beloved Slime Mould. Every aspirant is implanted with a sample of their patron and it strengthens their resolve, piety and wisdom. They often contract the services of wanderers, evaluating them with GLORIOUS QUESTS.

The Holy Order of the Myxogastrian Knights is an independent production by RaptorShadow and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
